core_dilemma: Will you preserve your status or accept collapse?
scenario: Your faction is implicated in a catastrophic failure. Do you protect your reputation or reveal the truth that could ruin you?

choices.text: Expose the truth and accept exile.
Deflect blame onto a rival faction.

core_dilemma: Do you honor your personal bond or follow collective duty?
scenario: On the eve of a great migration, your partner refuses to leave. The convoy departs at dawn. What do you do?

choices.text: Stay behind and build a life with them.
Leave at dawn and never look back.
Try to persuade them through the night.
Sabotage the convoy so no one leaves.

core_dilemma: Do you protect tradition or make room for change?
scenario: Your mentor entrusts you with an ancient seed vault. A new climate demands a different crop. What do you plant?

choices.text: Preserve the old seeds exactly as taught.
Crossbreed for resilience and future yield.
Destroy the vault to force the council's hand.
Abandon agriculture and turn to trade.
